New Records: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father-son duo to play in an NBA game together.
Key Match Events: Anthony Davis scored 36 points and grabbed 16 rebounds while getting to the line 15 times.
Anthony Edwards led the Wolves with 27 points.
The Lakers capitalized on the Wolves' turnovers to build a significant lead.
Naz Reid scored five quick points in the final quarter to reduce the lead to four.
Anthony Davis scored 11 points in the final seven minutes to secure the win for the Lakers.
Post-Match Reflections: The Wolves need to address their backup center minutes after Towns' departure.
The Wolves struggled with turnovers and offensive rebounds.
Rudy Gobert was a force on the glass and active offensively.
Nickeil Alexander-Walker hit his threes and was a team-high +13.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wolves will stay on the West Coast in California to face the Sacramento Kings on Thursday, 10/24 at 9:00pm CT.
